amendment.description: To provide requirements with respect to United States activities in Afghanistan and Iraq.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1822 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1822 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S12357-12358; text: CR S12358) To provide requirements with respect to United States activities in Afghanistan and Iraq.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1822 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1822 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Murray.
